About
About

Hello, I'm Diane! As a Creative Technology student at ESILV in the Institute for Future Technologies in Paris-La Défense, I'm a versatile engineer skilled in both software and hardware domains. My passion lies in creating and leading projects, especially those aimed at understanding human psychology or benefiting our planet. I am proficient in a range of programming languages and software, including: Hello, I'm Diane! As a Creative Technology student at ESILV in the Institute for Future Technologies in Paris-La Défense, I'm a versatile engineer skilled in both software and hardware domains. My passion lies in creating and leading projects, especially those aimed at understanding human psychology or benefiting our planet. I am proficient in a range of programming languages and software, including:
